name: TOWN OF FOSTER v. RHODE ISLAND STATE LABOR RELATIONS BOARD
name_abbreviation: Town of Foster v. Rhode Island State Labor Relations Board

parties: TOWN OF FOSTER v. RHODE ISLAND STATE LABOR RELATIONS BOARD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Vincent F. Kane, Providence, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
TOWN OF FOSTER v. RHODE ISLAND STATE LABOR RELATIONS BOARD.
No. 83-187-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
June 23, 1983.
Vincent F. Kane, Providence, for petitioner.
Bradford Gorham, Providence, for respondent.
